Another option might be "Little Lord Fauntleroy," a classic tale about an American boy who discovers he is the heir to a British fortune, offering a journey of friendship and self-discovery set in Victorian England. Enjoy your movie time!

The movie follows a group of soldiers as they go behind enemy lines during World War II, offering a gripping tale of camaraderie and sacrifice.

If you prefer a more unique horror-thriller experience, "The Violent Kind" might be up your alley. Starring Taylor Cole, this film features a group of bikers being terrorized by a possessed girl and a gang of "Rockabillies" from the 1950s. It's a thrilling ride with unexpected twists!
